history.narrative: Law 16-22, the “Summer Youth Employment Act of 2005”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-23 which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 7, 2005, and July 6, 2005, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 14, 2005, it was assigned Act No. 16-131 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-22 became effective on October 18, 2005.
